form.primaryLanguageQuestion: What is your language of instruction?
form.languageQuestion: What language are you looking for?
form.primaryLanguageSpecificationQuestion: Which primary language type do you want to choose?
form.previouslyDoneLangQuestion: I have already completed a language course as part of my degree in previous studies
form.studyPeriodQuestion: What is the date of your desired course?
form.replacementQuestion: I feel that I have already acquired knowledge and skills equivalent to those included in my degree in my previous studies / working life / leisure time. (CEFR B1/B2)
form.mentoringQuestion: Do you need practice before completing a course that is part of your degree?
form.challengeQuestion: For me, learning a language is particularly challenging and it makes me very nervous/scared.
form.studyPlaceQuestion: What is your preferred teaching method?
form.integratedQuestion: I am interedted in a course that is integrated into the studies in my field.
form.independentQuestion: I want to work independently or autonomously.
form.flexibleQuestion: I want to take a course with a flexible schedule
form.moocQuestion: Do you want to search for MOOCs (Massive Open Online Courses)?
form.mentoringQuestionYes: I would like to have a litle bit of training before starting my studies
form.mentoringQuestionNo: I dont think that i need training
form.graduationQuestionNo: I am not graduating within half a year.
form.primaryLanguageExplanation: Your language of general education, i.e. the language in which you have completed the mother tongue syllabus of a Finnish comprehensive school and/or upper secondary school, affects the completion of your studies. Read more detailed instructions on the Study Service page
form.replacementQuestion_fi_primary_written: Have you written a laudatur or eximia in the mother tongue (Finnish) (or S2) matriculation examination, or are you otherwise a skilled and self-directed writer?
